flags.name: --client-feature
flags.validation: Valid values: giant_anchor_prediction_creation, giant_anchor_prediction_comment, expert_broadcast_message_creation, expert_job_production_plan_dispatch_instruction_creation, development, super_power_post_creation, slack_realtime_chat.

flags.description: User ID to associate with the session
flags.name: --user

permissions: Any authenticated user can create a session; admin is not required.
side_effects: Creates an OpenAI realtime session record and requests a short-lived client secret from OpenAI before validation.
validation_notes: --client-feature is required and must be a valid client feature enum. If --model is omitted, the server sets a default model of gpt-4o-realtime-preview. Server validates presence of client_secret_value and client_secret_expires_at; creation fails if the OpenAI token fetch fails.
